detaileddescription.para:
Signal function of the container
cont
pointer to a container object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Refresh the layout of a container
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be refreshed

Handle column type layouts
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be handled

Handle row type layouts
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be handled

Handle the center layout
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be handled

Handle the pretty layout. Put as many object as possible in row then begin a new row
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be handled

Handle the grid layout. Align same-sized objects in a grid
cont
pointer to an object which layout should be handled

Handle auto fit. Set the size of the object to involve all children.
cont
pointer to an object which size will be modified

Create a container objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new container
copy
pointer to a container object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created container

Set a layout on a container
cont
pointer to a container object
layout
a layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *cont, lv_fit_t left, lv_fit_t right, lv_fit_t top, lv_fit_t bottom)
memberdef.name: lv_cont_set_fit4

detaileddescription.para:
Set the fit policy in all 4 directions separately. It tell how to change the container's size automatically.
cont
pointer to a container object
left
left fit policy from lv_fit_t
right
right fit policy from lv_fit_t
top
bottom fit policy from lv_fit_t
bottom
bottom fit policy from lv_fit_t

Get the layout of a container
cont
pointer to container object
the layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

Get left fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get right fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get top fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get bottom fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t
